# **Professor Vasco Cadavez**
**Polytechnic Institute of Bragança<br> Agrarian School & Department of Animal Science<br>Bragança, Portugal**


I’m a Professor in the [Animal Science Department](http://cimo.ipb.pt/web/index.php?r=olderresearcher/view&id=77) at the School of Agriculture of the Polytechnic Institute of Braganza (ESA-IPB), where I teach [Animal Breeding](http://portal3.ipb.pt/index.php/pt/guiaects/cursos/licenciaturas/curso?cod_escola=3041&cod_curso=9129) and [Biotechnology Applied to Genetic Improvement](http://portal3.ipb.pt/index.php/pt/guiaects/cursos/licenciaturas/curso?cod_escola=3041&cod_curso=9029). I’m also an active researcher at the [Socio-Ecological Systems Group](http://cimo.ipb.pt/web/index.php?r=olderresearcher/view&id=77) of the [Mountain Research Center (CIMO)](https://cimo.ipb.pt/web/), based at IPB.
